title: White Magic
description: Available March 2015All is not well in Underland.Human Observers are being replaced by Grenlix and people are losing their memoriesClaire is being taught magic, which no human should be able to do.Someone is not happy about this, and about Claire poking her nose into what's behind the missing memories.Things, nasty things, start to happen around Claire.
author: R.B. Harkess
